Nothing.title: Nothing
Nothing.description: Parent type for all falsy values.

NotFound.title: NotFound
NotFound.description: Value returned by lookup functions in case nothing is found.

Stop.title: Stop
Stop.description: Value used to stop iterationin .each() and similar functions.

Something.title: Something
Something.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

Obj.title: Obj
Obj.description: Parent type for all composite types.

Single.title: Single
Single.description: Parent type for all single value types.

Num.title: Num
Num.description: Parent type for all single value types.

Cat.title: Cat
Cat.description: Parent type for all composite types.

functions.description: Checks if value is function and it's type is Action.

functions.source:
v => v
    ? v._isAnything
      ? v.isNothing() ? false : !!v()
      : true
    : false
